Package com.stratic.tpl

Interface Factory

public interface Factory
An engine able to create new templates instances. Each factory produce a specific kind of template.

By analogy, a factory is to a template what a class is to an object.

You can get the factories from:

  • Templates: The factory used to create the template.
  • Tags: The factory used to create default content at the location materialized by the tag.
  • factories loaders: The root factories.

  • Method Details

    • create

      Template create()
      Create a new template from this factory.
      Returns:
      A new template created by this factory.

    • getTagsNames

      Set<String> getTagsNames()
      Gets tags names used in this factory.
      Returns:
      a set of strings where each entry is a valid tag name for produced templates;

    • getTagsList

      List<String> getTagsList()
      Gets an ordered list of tags names used in this factory.
      Returns:
      a list of strings where each entry is a valid tag name for produced templates;

    • tagExists

      boolean tagExists(String tagName)
      Check if a given tag name is defined by this factory
      Parameters:
      tagName - tag name to be checked for existency.
      Returns:
      true if given tagname is defined for this factory templates, else false.
